name: Livander BattleGround (ALPHA V)
description:
I made this battle royale game under 1 week for my Youtube content, the game is lack polish but playable, so I decided to publish the game so everyone can try it

You can choose how many people included in the battle royale and fight them to survivle till the end. 

Equipments in this game are rifle, gun, helmet, and vest

NOTE: 

-You must AIM to shoot

-This game can be considered as PROTOTYPE, sorry for the inconvenient 

Subscribe to my YouTube Channel

https://Youtube.com/LivanderGamedev

Music for this game:

https://Soundimage.org
